item.title: US drops the number of vaccines it recommends for every child
item.description: The U.S. took the unprecedented step Monday of dropping the number of vaccines it recommends for every child â€” leaving other immunizations, such as flu shots, open to families to choose but without clear guidance.

item.title: Their homes survived the historic LA area wildfires, but a year later they fear living in them
Jury selection begins in trial for ex-officer accused in police response to Uvalde school shooting
